text: I've had the "please complete required fields" error a lot when i try to use autofill from the browser
Does anybody know how to add schema markup in HubSpot? I’ve tried in the header html in pages > templates  but nothing showing in page source once cache is cleared…

Hey Scott! Header HTML is usually my preferred method for implementing schema, so I'm not sure why that wouldn't be showing up for you. Can you link me to an example page where you've added it? I'm happy to take a look!
Hi, does anyone know how to add HubSpot Live Chat tracking in Google Tag Manager. It seems to load in an iframe which I cant seem to get to trigger any events. Help would be appreciated! Thanks
Hi <@UCSKU31SA>, sorry for my own late reply. This is not visible anymore, so all good now. It did indeed look to be crowdvocate related as AJ said
